title: Bento Box in a Dark Forest, Yancey Strickler
description:
Yancey Strickler is the founder of Kickstarter, the author of 'This Could Be Our Future' and has built a reputation as one of the most insightful thinkers about life purpose and technology.

In this interview he talks about his 'Dark Forest' theory of the internet, and his recent life purpose technique called Bentoism.

Yancey will be leading a session on Bentoism for the Rebel Wisdom Gym on Wednesday 25th November at 8pm UK / 3pm EST / 12noon PST. Check out the membership plans here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
